Uses of Package
com.appglu.android

Packages that use com.appglu.android
com.appglu.android The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask. 
 

Classes in com.appglu.android used by com.appglu.android
AppGluAsyncTask
          Extension of Android's AsyncTask to add AppGluAsyncTask.onException(Exception) and AppGluAsyncTask.onFinished() callbacks.
AppGluSettings
          This class contains configuration and customization settings and is used to initialize the AppGlu singleton.
To create it, you will need access credentials to authenticate the SDK on the server side.
CrudApi
          CrudApi contains create, read, update and delete operations to be applied on your tables.
DeviceInstallation
          Represents a installation of your app on a device.
PushApi
          PushApi is used to register / unregister the device making it eligible to receive push notifications.
SavedQueriesApi
          SavedQueriesApi allow you to run your previously created SQLs on AppGlu and obtain the results.
SavedQuery
          Simple wrapper around SavedQueriesApi to provide a more model driven way of executing saved queries.
UserApi
          UserApi has methods to login / logout and sign up new mobile app users.
